item.title: UNSW Course Review
item.description: Context Before UNSW, I had major interest in mathematics pursuing actuarial studies. However, the lifestyle of an actuary seemed stagnant, so I picked a double degree in Computer Science / Mathematics as the degree was 4 years rather than studying 3 year bachelors + 5 years studying the actuarial exams, despite having 0 programming experience.
